Schwarzwasserbrücke railway station () is a railway station in the municipality of Schwarzenburg, in the Swiss canton of Bern. It is an intermediate stop on the standard gauge Bern–Schwarzenburg line of BLS AG. The station takes its name from the nearby  over the Schwarzwasser, a tributary of the river Sense.
Services
the following services stop at Schwarzwasserbrücke:
* Bern S-Bahn : half-hourly service between  and .
